CustomField.description: Comma-separated list of status values on the parent record that indicate a closed or completed state. When an inbound email arrives and the parent record has one of these statuses, a new AgentExecution conversation cycle is started instead of resuming the existing one. Examples: Closed,Solved for Case; Converted for Lead; Completed,Cancelled for a custom object. Leave blank to disable status-based cycle detection.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Comma-separated status values that force a new conversation cycle (e.g. Closed,Solved for Case or Converted for Lead). Replaces the hardcoded Case-only check.
CustomField.label: Email Terminal Statuses
